pager.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a small machine you can carry in your pocket that can receive signals from a telephone. It tells you when someone has sent you a message, or wants you to telephone them, for example by making a noise.
pager.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a small device which makes a sharp sound to tell the person carrying it to contact someone by telephone
pager.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: The Japanese are developing pagers the size of credit cards.
